txt.en: 'Are those... horses?'
DNT
DNT

'Other scouts already told me about the insects swarming the Bruinen, but I've never seen such an infestation before!\n\n'Elrohir and I agreed to see how many we could each defeat before meeting downstream. Since he's already gotten a head start, perhaps we could work together. Surely that doesn't count as cheating!'
'I could find nothing of note. I hope your search fared better.'
You should talk to Elladan to start searching the Ford of Bruinen together.
'Elrohir, [placeholder]!'
There seems to be a black cloak floating near the horses.\n\nYou should examine it.
'I wonder if Elrohir's found anything by now?'
'Well then, let's add a few more of these pests to our count!'
'That's the last of them. How has your search fared?'
In hopes of finding signs of the Black Riders, you set out to search the Bruinen.
'[placeholder]! Come, let us clear this place of vermin!'
DNT
'That's four!'
DNT
Examine the black cloak
You should follow Elladan towards the Ford of Bruinen.
DNT
At the ford, you discovered the corpses of three horses that belonged to the Black Riders.\n\nYou should discuss these findings with Elladan.
Listen to the twins' conversation
'Then I suppose that must be the only trace left of the Riders themselves.'
'There's nothing else that can be done here. We should continue moving.'
'At this rate, I'm sure we'll catch up to Elrohir!'
Elladan has caught up with you and Elrohir.\n\nYou should let the twins discuss their findings, or lack thereof.
You have made your way towards the Blooming Fens.\n\nElrohir must be here somewhere.

'Elladan convinced you to help him with our little competition, didn't he? I kept track at first, but...' Elrohir gestures to the nearby horse corpses with a sigh. 'What I found -- or rather, what I didn't find -- troubled me.'

'Three horses upstream, five here... that makes eight of the nine mounts accounted for. I scoured every part of the woods for the Riders, but to no avail. If any of them linger in the Trollshaws, they have made themselves scarce.

'Hold on, what's that in the water? Is that a cloak?'
'Now, what have we here...'
'Ugh. Is there no end?'
You have found Elrohir, though he seems to be in a bit of trouble.\n\nYou should help defend him.
The answers escape us. For now.'
Mission: The Further Adventures of Elladan & Elrohir, Chapter 1

'It seems the swarm found the Black Riders' mounts. I count only three steeds, however -- the river may have carried the rest further.

'Go, find Elrohir in the fens and see if he requires aid. I shall stay behind to make sure the Riders did not escape into the woods.

'Oh, and let him know how many insects we defeated. I'm sure he was no match for us!'
Talk to Elladan
Talk to Elladan
You have helped Elrohir successfully fend off a swarm of insects.\n\nYou should talk to him.
Find Elrohir
The black cloak is tattered and marred by long slashes
DNT
Defend Elrohir
Follow Elladan
Talk to Elrohir
'Nine!'
'We found this black cloak, but nothing more.'
'My hope is that they have fled back to their master, though that is mere speculation.'
